item.title: Code
item.description: Software I developed, contribute to or mantain A video classification wrapper in python3 and tensorflow (github). The bde event detection module (github) and its corresponding docker image (github, docker hub). An text classification with semantic information module(github). Software I use and like Productivity Man pages for human beings: cheat, tldr and how2. RSI-prevention with good typing and modal editing with vim. Vimify browser with cVim and wasavi. Editor war stalemate: spacemacs.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a computer scientist currently pursuing my PhD in Machine Learning and working as a research associate in the Institute of Informatics and Telecommunications in NCSR Demokritos. You can get a pdf of my detailed cv in English (Updated 3-2021). Alternatively, check out a tl;dr version below. Education PhD in machine learning, from the Informatics and Telecommunications department (DIT) of the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens (NKUA), co-supervised by the Institute of Informatics and Telecommunications (IIT) of the National Center for Scientific Research Demokritos (NCSRD), funded by the St.
